Description and Justification: Widely adopted, many software tools exist for encoding and decoding. JPEG 2000 part 1 is considered an accepted format as per NARA Transfer Guidance.
NARA Preferred Processing and Transforma: Adobe Photoshop; GNU Image Manipulation Program; IrfanView

Description and Justification: Often referred to as "JPEG," however JPEG is the encoding and JFIF is the file format. The JPEG File Interchange Format is well documented and well supported.
NARA Preferred Processing and Transforma: Adobe Photoshop; GNU Image Manipulation Program; IrfanView

Description and Justification: Often referred to as "JPEG," however JPEG is the encoding and JFIF is the file format. The JPEG File Interchange Format is well documented and well supported.
NARA Preferred Processing and Transforma: Adobe Photoshop; GNU Image Manipulation Program; IrfanView

Description and Justification: Often referred to as "JPEG," however JPEG is the encoding and JFIF is the file format. JPEG is well documented and well supported. JPEG 1.02 is considered an acceptable format as per NARA Transfer Guidance.
NARA Preferred Processing and Transforma: Adobe Photoshop; GNU Image Manipulation Program; IrfanView
